subject: Updated Dependent Object Framework Release
msgSnippet: I just uploaded an update to the Dependent Object Framework (DOF) http://sourceforge.net/projects/dof/ Description: http://www.junit.org/node/308 In a
messageBody:
I just uploaded an update to the Dependent Object Framework (DOF)
http://sourceforge.net/projects/dof/

Description: http://www.junit.org/node/308

In a nutshell, with this framework,
1. It's OK and EASY to run JUnit tests against the database
2. You don't necessarily need mock objects for doing TDD where there
are database dependencies.


Please let me know what you think of this project!
For more info, see article: http://www.junit.org/node/308


Cheers,

Justin Gordon
justingordon@...
